show_name: A Bridge to the Starry Skies (TV)
plot: Kazuma's brother Ayumu needs to recuperate from an illness, so they move from the city to a rural mountain village. They plan to board at their father's inn, Yorozuyo, but get lost on their way. Wandering in the mountains, Kazuma stumbles across a girl named Ui Nakatsugawa. It's the first of many encounters in his new country life.
opening_theme: "Hoshikaze no Horoscope" (星風ホのロスコープ) by Nomico
ending_theme: "Dash do Cinderella" (だっしゅどシンデレラ) by Eriko Nakamura and Ai Shimizu
"Hoshikaze no Horoscope" by Eriko Nakamura, Ai Shimizu & Ringo Aoba (ep 12)
